page_content: The page discusses the closure of Albulapass road for the Slow Up 2014 sports event.
The page discusses a meeting of the Swiss Criminological Society focusing on the topic of evidence.
The page discusses the enactment of a cultural promotion law and related regulations in the canton of Graubünden.
The page discusses the integration of children with disabilities into the educational system in Graubünden and other regional matters.
The page discusses various regional matters including education, immigration, and infrastructure in the canton of Graubünden.
The page issues a warning about "Checkdifferenzbetrüger," a type of scam involving checks and online transactions.
The page discusses traffic disruptions due to the Lenzerheide Motor Classics, a motorsport event for historical automobiles and motorcycles.
The page discusses the introduction of Rumantsch Grischun as a second language in primary schools and other regional matters.
The page discusses a postulate concerning property valuation regulations in the canton of Graubünden.
The page discusses a draft for a new federal water protection ordinance and other regional matters in the canton of Graubünden.
The page discusses a joint exercise between the cantonal police of Graubünden and the army, causing temporary traffic disruptions in Thusis.
The page provides guidelines and documents for construction projects outside of building zones in the canton of Graubünden.
The page provides information on the alarm systems used in the canton of Graubünden, including general and water alarms, and their annual testing.
